title: RemoteScan
description:
You are just moments away from being able to scan directly from any scanner into any hosted software, as well as converting your ordinary scanner into a network scanner for your office.


Connect scanners to workstations and scan directly into any hosted application.


RemoteScanÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â® for Terminal Services or CitrixÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â®
Scan Directly into Any Application Running on Any Server. 

    
* Use with any application running on a Windows 2000, Windows 2003, or Windows 2007    
  Terminal Services Server.
    
* Use with any application running on a Citrix Server.

* Scanners are attached via USB to any user&#039;s workstation.
    
* Scan insurance cards, notes, or any document from any type of document scanner.
    
* Works with all major medical EMR systems (Cerner, McKesson, GE, NextGen, 
  Allscripts - all recommend RemoteScan).
    
* Works with all brands of scanners (Fujitsu, HP, Canon, Xerox, Kodak, etc. - all 
  recommend RemoteScan).


RemoteScanÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â® for LAN
Convert any Scanner into a Network Scanner.
    
* A much better User Interface than what is provided by &#039;network&#039; scanners.
    
* Scan directly into ANY application that is running on your own PC.
    
* Let one scanner meet the needs of an entire work group.


For more information please visit the main website:- http://www.remote-scan.com/
